triples.name: Proof theory
triples.relevance: The paper builds on proof theory foundations and proposes improvements to cut elimination methods.

triples.name: Cut-elimination theorem
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel double induction approach to prove cut admissibility without ordinal assignments.

triples.name: Type theory
triples.relevance: The paper provides a consistency proof for ramified type theory without axiom of reducibility.

triples.name: Lattice (order)
triples.relevance: Lattice theory is fundamental to the paper's algebraic and logistic investigations of free lattices.

triples.name: Boolean algebra
triples.relevance: The paper proposes definitions of countably complete Boolean lattices as deductive calculi.

triples.name: Constructivism (philosophy of mathematics)
triples.relevance: The paper provides constructive proofs of consistency for both ramified type theory and elementary number theory.

triples.name: Free lattice
triples.relevance: The paper proposes methods to construct free objects over preordered sets using lattice definitions.

triples.name: Number theory
triples.relevance: The paper applies its consistency proof methods to elementary number theory.

triples.name: Semilattice
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a definition of semilattices as deductive calculi.

triples.name: Distributive lattice
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a definition of distributive lattices as deductive calculi.
